Welcome to Rest API’s documentation!¶

REST API repository Contacts¶

async src.repository.contacts.create_contact(body: ContactModel, user: User, db: Session) → Contact¶

Creating a contact for a registered user using the contact model

Parameters:

  • body (ContactModel) – The data for the contact to create.

  • user (User) – The user to retrieve contacts for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

The newly created contact.

Return type:

Contact

async src.repository.contacts.delete_contact(contact_id: int, user: User, db: Session) → Contact | None¶

Removes a single contact with the specified ID for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – The ID of the contact to remove.

  • user (User) – The user to remove the contact for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

The removed contact, or None if it does not exist.

Return type:

Сontact | None

async src.repository.contacts.get_contact(contact_id: int, user: User, db: Session) → Contact¶

Retrieves a single contact with the specified ID for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – The ID of the contact to retrieve.

  • user (User) – The user to retrieve contacts for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

The contact with the specified ID, or None if it does not exist.

Return type:

Contact | None

async src.repository.contacts.get_contacts(skip: int, limit: int, user: User, db: Session) → List[Contact]¶

Retrieves a list of contacts for a specific user with specified pagination parameters.

Parameters:

  • skip (int) – The number of contacts to skip.

  • limit (int) – The maximum number of contacts to return.

  • user (User) – The user to retrieve contacts for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

A list of contacts.

Return type:

List[Contact]

async src.repository.contacts.get_contacts_birthday(user: User, db: Session) → List[Contact]¶

Receives contacts who will have birthdays this week

Parameters:

  • user (User) – The user to retrieve contacts for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

A list of contacts.

Return type:

List[Contact]

async src.repository.contacts.search_contacts(skip: int, limit: int, firstname: str | None, lastname: str | None, email: str | None, user: User, db: Session) → List[Contact]¶

Retrieves contacts that match the search parameters for a specific user

Parameters:

  • skip (int) – The number of contacts to skip.

  • limit (int) – The maximum number of contacts to return.

  • firstname (str | None) – contact firstname.

  • lastname – contact lastname.

:type lastname : str | None :param email: contact email. :type email: str | None :param user: The user to retrieve contacts for. :type user: User :param db: The database session. :type db: Session :return: A list of contacts. :rtype: List[Contact]

async src.repository.contacts.update_contact(contact_id: int, body: ContactModel, user: User, db: Session) → Contact | None¶

Updates a single contact with the specified ID for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – The ID of the contact to update.

  • body (ContactModel) – The updated data for the contact.

  • user (User) – The user to update the contact for.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

The updated contact, or None if it does not exist.

Return type:

Contact | None

REST API repository Users¶

async src.repository.users.confirmed_email(email: str, db: Session) → None¶

Sets the value of the email as confirmed

Parameters:

  • email (str) – user email

  • db (Session) – The database session.

async src.repository.users.create_user(body: UserModel, db: Session) → User¶

Creating a new user using the User model

Parameters:

  • body (UserModel) – The data for the user to create.

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

The newly created user.

Return type:

User

async src.repository.users.get_user_by_email(email: str, db: Session) → User¶

Retrieves the user using its email value :param email: user email :type email: str :param db: The database session. :type db: Session :return: returns the user from the database. :rtype: User

async src.repository.users.update_avatar(email: str, url: str, db: Session) → User¶

Updates the user’s avatar using cloudinary

Parameters:

  • email (str) – user email

  • url (str) – cloudinary url

  • db (Session) – The database session.

Returns:

updated user avatar.

Return type:

User

async src.repository.users.update_token(user: User, token: str | None, db: Session) → None¶

Update user refresh token

Parameters:

  • user (User) – The user to update refresh token for .

  • token (str | None) – refresh token to upgrade to

  • db (Session) – The database session.
